publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6759# Margaret Smith: £1 Drop-off Fee at Edinburgh Airport—That the Parliament notes the proposal by BAA to introduce a £1 drop-off charge at Edinburgh Airport; believes that this proposal has not been properly thought out; agrees with many people across the capital that this is an unnecessary and unfair charge; considers that the fee will have a disproportionately negative effect on older or disabled people; notes concerns that the fee may actually be more than £1, and believes that the fee, scheduled to start in October 2010, should not be introduced. Supported by: Mike Pringle*, David McLetchie*, Helen Eadie*, Gil Paterson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Iain Smith*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Ian McKee*, Gavin Brown*, Jeremy Purvis*, Margo MacDonald*, Jim Tolson*, Angela Constance*
S3M-6759#£1 Drop-off Fee at Edinburgh Airport (lodged on 26 July 2010) Nicol Stephen*, Ken Macintosh*, Linda Fabiani*
